42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: it was narrated that 'Adiyy bin Hatim said:"I said: 'O Messenger of Allah, I shoot game and I follow its tracks after of night. He said: 'If you find your arrow in it, and no predator has eaten from it, then eat it

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الَّذِي يَرْمِي الصَّيْدَ فَيَغِيبُ عَنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: The One Who Shoots An Arrow But (The Game) Gets Away From Him
